visual_style_summary: The overall visual approach exudes opulence and regal elegance, emphasizing high-detail craftsmanship and vibrant gemstone contrast. Warm, luxurious tones with precise highlights and soft shadows create a majestic atmosphere. The emphasis is on sharp textures, realistic reflections, and realistic sparkle to enhance the beauty, tradition, and craftsmanship of the Indian bridal necklace set in a cinematic, high-end style.

scenes.description: A slow macro glide across the layered diamond motifs and emerald stones, highlighting intricate craftsmanship, details, and the vibrant contrasts of the gemstones.
scenes.camera_movement: Slow, smooth macro glide across the necklace
scenes.lighting_setup: Warm, royal lighting with soft spotlight accents, subtle fill light to preserve natural textures

scenes.description: Transition to a gentle top-angle reveal of the full set, showcasing the necklace and matching earrings in an elegant, regal composition against champagne silk background.
scenes.camera_movement: Controlled slow upward movement from macro
scenes.lighting_setup: Consistent warm, royal lighting with subtle sparkle highlights on all gemstones

scenes.description: Refined shot of the complete set in full view, capturing intricate details and rich textures, emphasizing luxury and elegance suitable for a high-end bridal campaign.
scenes.camera_movement: Stationary with slight tilt or subtle camera sway for dynamic feel
scenes.lighting_setup: Warm, diffused, luxurious lighting with subtle sparkle highlights and realistic reflections

technical_notes: Maintain strict product consistency with no distortion or morphing. Ensure precise reflections and sparkle highlights are achieved through controlled lighting and camera angles. Use macro lenses at f/2.8 for detailed focus. Lighting must enhance the natural brilliance of diamonds and emeralds while preserving the gold-metallic hues as per the visual reference. Avoid overexposure of gemstones; keep the background and product in a balanced, warm tone that complements the opulent theme.
